name: Social Distancing: The Video Game
description:
Social Distancing - The Video Game!

Try to get an entire year's supply of toilet paper while keeping social distance from all the people breaking quarantine.

Click the left mouse button to move your player around the game screen to pick up rolls of toilet paper  , pick up all 100 rolls of toilet paper to win the game.  But watch out for the quarantine breakers in the red hats !!! If they get too close and violate social distance, you will be infected with coronavirus and lose the game. 

Controls:

Click the Left Mouse button to tell the player which direction to walk towards

Hold down the Left Shift key while clicking the Left Mouse Button to make the player jump - great for avoiding fast moving quarantine breakers.

Use the W-A-S-D keys to move the camera around the map
